original_text: Then Pharaoh's army was come forth out of Egypt: and when the Chaldeans that besieged Jerusalem heard tidings of them, they departed from Jerusalem.
korean_text: 바로의 군대가 애굽에서 나오매 예루살렘을 에워쌌던 갈대아인이 그 소문을 듣고 예루살렘에서 떠났더라

sentences.original_text: Then Pharaoh's army was come forth out of Egypt
and when the Chaldeans that besieged Jerusalem
